member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.Gantt.TreeGridNodeDropEventArgs.Position
member.summary: Gets the position where the dragged node is dropped relative to the target node.
member.remarks: This property indicates whether the dragged node is dropped in relation to the target node as one of the following: Default, DropAbove, DropBelow, DropAsChild, DropHere, or None. It enables precise drag-and-drop operations within the GanttGrid. Use this property in the event handler to customize behavior based on the drop position, such as reordering tasks or updating the node hierarchy.
